Supplier.description: Analytical lab or supplier issuing the impurity/residual report (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material name evaluated for impurities/residual solvents.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier/code printed on the report.

Lot.description: Batch/lot identifier of the tested sample.

ReportDate.description: Report or test date for the results.

ResidualSolvents.description: Table of residual solvents with result (ppm), LOQ, and analytical method.

Solvent.description: Name of the solvent per ICH Q3C (e.g., Ethanol, Methanol, n-Hexane).

ContentPpm.description: Measured concentration in ppm as a numeric value. If reported as '<LOQ', leave numeric empty and rely on LOQ and Result text in SpecificImpurities.

LOQppm.description: Limit of quantitation (ppm) for the solvent.

SpecificImpurities.description: Specific named impurities with results, LOQ, and method (e.g., 1,4-Dioxane).

Impurity.description: Name of the impurity (e.g., Ethylene Oxide, Benzo[a]pyrene).

Result.description: Reported result text (e.g., 'ND (<0.10 ppm)'). Preserve qualifiers and comparators (ND, <, <=).

LOQ.description: LOQ as printed including unit (e.g., '0.10 ppm'). Keep as text to preserve units and significant figures.
